We thank our current directors for their outstanding service to HP and welcome the opportunity to work with our new members. HP's revelation came the same day that another technology heavyweight, Google Inc. , disclosed a surprise reshuffling of its own: CEO Eric Schmidt is relinquishing the job to Google Inc. co-founder Larry Page.
